definition: fan/sliding, hinged or detachable flat part of sth/classifier for doors, windows etc
to fan/to slap sb on the face
window/the opening panel of a window

sentences.english: Nine men knock at the nice door near the net.
sentences.chinese: 九個男人在敲網子邊的那扇漂亮門。

sentences.english: Cang Li Man rushes across to the window.
sentences.chinese: 倉裏滿橫衝過去，到那扇窗前。

sentences.english: I walked to the locked door, the sounds of the crying becoming louder.
sentences.chinese: 我走到鎖着的那扇門前，哭聲變得更清楚了。

sentences.english: I'll try to find out who broken the window.
sentences.chinese: 我會想法子查出誰打破了那扇窗戶。

sentences.english: From its nest the bird flew down and fanned the embers with its wings.
sentences.chinese: 知更鳥從它的巢中飛下來，用它的翅膀扇着火的灰燼。

sentences.english: I stepped in front of the kid and slapped him hard across the face.
sentences.chinese: 我走上前去，狠狠扇了胖小子一耳光。

sentences.english: A single blow of the lion's paw and his cosmogony is smashed.
sentences.chinese: 獅子舉起爪子扇一下，他的世界便被打得粉碎。

sentences.english: The machining fundamentals and the equation for the locus of a variable-ratio gear sec-tor are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了變比齒扇加工原理，給出了其運動方程。

sentences.english: The "Snow Flower" producers hope they can change the trend.
sentences.chinese: 《雪花祕扇》的製片人希望他們能改變這個趨勢。

sentences.english: I reached the gate that opened onto the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我走到臨湖然而開的那扇門前。

sentences.english: A handsome grilled gateway opens to the garden of all desired things.
sentences.chinese: 通向渴望之園的那扇富麗堂皇的格柵門大敞開着。

sentences.english: A window in the back of the bus is half open.
sentences.chinese: 公交車後部有扇窗戶半開着。

sentences.english: Mrs. Kimble slipped into the yellow door and disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 而金布爾夫人進了那扇黃門，消失不見了。

sentences.english: The gear sector of variable transmission ratio in automobile steering mechanism is a variable module non-circular gear.
sentences.chinese: 變傳動比汽車轉向器齒扇是變模數的非圓齒輪。

sentences.english: Fan delta front includes proximal and distal bar deposits.
sentences.chinese: 扇三角洲前緣亞相由近端壩和遠端壩沉積組成。

sentences.english: I want to tell everybody “Snow flower and the Secret Fan” it’s a beautiful film adaptation of the book.
sentences.chinese: 我想說《雪花祕扇》是原書的完美改變。

definition: to close (a door)/to turn off (light, electrical equipment etc)
to push open (a gate etc)/to push away/to reject/to decline
to stand as a goalkeeper/to keep guard on a gate

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
to fan/to flap/to incite/to instigate (a strike etc)
to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
to throw off/to fling sth up (in anger)/refers to dramatic sale prices
to swing one's arms/to wash one's hands of sth
